item.title: Exam questions for FIT2086
item.description: Lecture 1 Define the following terms: A population A sample A model What is inference? Lecture 2 What is variance in the context of a random variable? Lecture 3 Briefly explain what maximum likelihood works is and a reason why it may be so effective Suppose we have an unbiased estimator \(\hat{\theta}\) of a parameter \(\theta\) with variance \(2.
